title: [P22] Indie Fonts...3!
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 1.Feb.2007 6.13am 

Indie Fonts 3

Fresh from the printers, we have the brand new [Indie Fonts 3](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indie%2520Fonts) books. This is the exclusive hardcover version. This volume features 20 foundries with over 400 pages of type specimens, plus a bonus CD with 53 fonts!

Like the previous two volumes, Indie Fonts 3 showcases some of the best independent type designers and foundries from around the world. There isnâ€™t a better way to preview type designs than in print and this book has over 400 pages of fonts from digital foundries.

Indie Fonts 3 includes specimens and fonts from:  
 [Baseline Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Baseline%2520Fonts), [Blue Vinyl Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Blue%2520Vinyl), [Device Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Device%2520Fonts), [E-phemera Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/E-phemera%2520Fonts), [Font Brothers](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%2520Bros), [Handselecta](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Handselecta), [Jeremy Tankard Typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jeremy%2520Tankard%2520Typography), [Kenn Munk](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Kenn%2520Munk), [Letterhead Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Letterhead%2520Fonts), [Pizzadude](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Pizzadude), [Positype](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Positype), [Process Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Process%2520Type%2520Foundry), [Rimmer Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rimmer%2520Type%2520Foundry), [Shinntype](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Shinntype), [SparkyType](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/SparkyType), [Suitcase Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Suitcase%2520Type), [Suomi Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Suomi%2520Type%2520Foundry), [Village](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Village), [Virus Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Virus) & [Wilton Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091706/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Wilton%2520Foundry).

This book was assembled by the original editors of the first two Indie Fonts, but published by Rockport Publishers in a flex-bound cover. The flexbound version will be available everywhere design books are sold. For those completists who prefer all 3 volumes in hardcover, we are the exclusive outlet for the limited hardcover version. Both editions contain the same pages, but the hardcover is...well, hardcover with a dust jacket. As an introductory special, we are offering Indie Fonts 3 at $35 plus shipping (list price $39.95) until February 15th.

As a special offer we are bundling Indie Fonts 2 & 3 together for the very special price of $60.00 (prices do not include shipping).
